title: (x) Cold War Kids logo - Bodoni Poster Italic {Eric Hague}
content:
Could someone help me out with identifying this typeface?  
 [http://coldwarkids.com/images/layout/cwk-header.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002739/http:/coldwarkids.com/images/layout/cwk-header.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Endless website logo - modified Cosmos {Gary Schmidt}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35466 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Pastures of Plenty" Woody Guthrie book cover - Avalon (Avernus) {Mark S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35464 "Go to next forum topic")
author: phaedrus

comments.content: [Bodoni Poster Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002739/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/poster-bodoni/). Remembered it from one of yves’s [reviews](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002739/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=142).
Like them ball terminals? Here are more: [http://typographica.org/001077.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907002739/http:/typographica.org/001077.php "http://typographica.org/001077.php")
Try Bodoni Antiqua Black is spot on.
